extendedInfo.description: In this Live Wallpaper you can tap on a person to watch how infecting them would affect the rest of the people in the network. Double tap anywhere to start over with a new network.Red people are infectiousBlue people are recoveringGreen people are healthyIn the full version you have full control over:-The number of people-How interconnected they are-The different colors of infected, healthy and recovering people-The Sizes of the people and connections between them-How the simulation is started-Customizing the disease's properties including how long people are infectious or recovering, the odds of death from infection, the birth rate of new people and whether or not they are born infectedSo you have the ability to make some really interesting simulations and awesome looking wallpapers!Keywords: disease, propagation, infectious, infect, sick, healthy, recovering, live wallpaper, livewallpaper, exitbrain

reviews.comment: Never used it as a wallpaper but play with it everyday lol runs great and its fun just to see how my diseases work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: THIS IS THE BEST LIVE WALLPAPER EVER PLEASE UPDATE!!!
